name: Last Bastion of Wizardom
description:
Try as you might, your efforts to save the final wizard tower will fail. 

You will only delay the inevitable.

Your spell will equip once you cross the entryway to the Tower

Spend the souls of your vanquished enemies at the top of the tower to heal it or boost the offensive capabilities of the Orb. 

Made in UE5. This is my very first game. Enjoy.
